titleInfo.title: Capitol Hill Redevelopment and Honorary Citizenship of Nashville for Hon. Neal J. Hardy, 1961 March 22

mods.identifier: RG3 2744 Capitol Hill Redevelopment Luncheon for Hon Neal J Hardy March 22 1961 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A photo related to the Capitol Hill Redevelopment Luncheon and planning sessions hosted in honor of the Federal Housing Commissioner Neal J. Hardy. Mr. Hardy was made an Honorary Citizen of the City of Nashville, presented by Mayor Ben West. Hardy was an executive of the National Association of Home Builders when President John F. Kennedy nominated him to head the Federal Housing Administration in 1961. The agency was a predecessor of the Department of Housing and Urban Development. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
